Healthy.treatment: No treatment required. Continue regular care and monitoring.
Healthy.prevention: Maintain proper watering, fertilization, and pest control practices.

Early_Blight.treatment: Remove infected leaves. Apply fungicide containing chlorothalonil or copper-based compounds.
Early_Blight.prevention: Practice crop rotation. Avoid overhead watering. Use mulch to prevent soil splash.

Late_Blight.treatment: Apply systemic fungicides immediately. Remove and destroy infected plants.
Late_Blight.prevention: Use resistant varieties. Ensure good air circulation. Avoid evening watering.

Leaf_Mold.treatment: Improve ventilation. Apply fungicides containing chlorothalonil or mancozeb.
Leaf_Mold.prevention: Reduce humidity. Space plants adequately. Remove infected leaves promptly.

Septoria_Leaf_Spot.treatment: Remove affected leaves. Apply chlorothalonil or copper-based fungicides.
Septoria_Leaf_Spot.prevention: Mulch around plants. Water at soil level. Rotate crops annually.

Bacterial_Spot.treatment: Apply copper-based bactericides. Remove severely infected plants.
Bacterial_Spot.prevention: Use disease-free seeds. Avoid overhead irrigation. Practice crop rotation.

Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.treatment: Remove infected plants immediately. Control whitefly vectors with insecticides.
Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.prevention: Use resistant varieties. Install insect screening. Control whiteflies early.

Bacterial_Wilt.treatment: No chemical cure. Remove and destroy infected plants. Disinfect tools.
Bacterial_Wilt.prevention: Plant resistant varieties. Control cucumber beetles. Rotate crops.
chemicals: No effective chemicals - focus on prevention

Rust.treatment: Apply triazole or strobilurin fungicides at first sign of infection.
Rust.prevention: Plant resistant varieties. Remove volunteer plants. Monitor regularly.

Powdery_Mildew.treatment: Apply sulfur or potassium bicarbonate sprays. Improve air circulation.
Powdery_Mildew.prevention: Avoid dense planting. Water in morning. Use resistant varieties.

Septoria_Tritici_Blotch.treatment: Apply DMI or QoI fungicides. Remove infected leaves.
Septoria_Tritici_Blotch.prevention: Plow under crop residue. Rotate crops. Plant resistant varieties.

Bacterial_Leaf_Blight.treatment: Apply copper bactericides. Drain fields properly.
Bacterial_Leaf_Blight.prevention: Use clean seeds. Avoid excessive nitrogen. Drain waterlogged fields.

Brown_Spot.treatment: Apply mancozeb or carbendazim fungicides. Improve soil fertility.
Brown_Spot.prevention: Use healthy seeds. Apply balanced fertilizer. Maintain proper water levels.

Leaf_Smut.treatment: Remove infected leaves. Apply propiconazole-based fungicides.
Leaf_Smut.prevention: Use resistant varieties. Maintain field hygiene. Avoid dense sowing.

Northern_Leaf_Blight.treatment: Apply strobilurin or triazole fungicides when lesions first appear.
Northern_Leaf_Blight.prevention: Rotate crops. Plant resistant hybrids. Bury crop residue.

Gray_Leaf_Spot.treatment: Apply strobilurin fungicides. Remove infected plant debris.
Gray_Leaf_Spot.prevention: Rotate crops for 2+ years. Till crop residue. Use resistant hybrids.

Common_Rust.treatment: Apply triazole or strobilurin fungicides at first rust pustules.
Common_Rust.prevention: Plant resistant hybrids. Scout fields regularly. Time planting appropriately.

Fusarium_Wilt.treatment: No chemical cure. Remove infected plants. Use soil fumigants pre-planting.
Fusarium_Wilt.prevention: Plant resistant varieties. Avoid planting in infested soil. Maintain soil health.

Verticillium_Wilt.treatment: No effective treatment. Remove infected plants. Soil solarization may help.
Verticillium_Wilt.prevention: Use resistant varieties. Practice long crop rotations. Improve soil health.
chemicals: No effective chemicals - prevention is key

Frogeye_Leaf_Spot.treatment: Apply strobilurin or triazole fungicides at early growth stages.
Frogeye_Leaf_Spot.prevention: Plant resistant varieties. Rotate crops. Bury crop residue.

Downy_Mildew.treatment: Apply systemic fungicides containing metalaxyl or fosetyl-aluminum.
Downy_Mildew.prevention: Use resistant varieties. Improve air circulation. Avoid overhead watering.

Phytophthora_Blight.treatment: Apply mefenoxam or phosphorous acid fungicides. Improve drainage.
Phytophthora_Blight.prevention: Plant in well-drained soil. Use raised beds. Avoid overwatering.
